author: greg_duncan
title: hmmmmm....I think I like it
review: this is a pretty good set. plenty of kanoka, kraata, and a mask and disc of time. it includes parts to build panrahk and 5 vahki, excluding the green one. six sets for 19.99 usd is pretty good, AND it includes more parts, but most parts are useless, like rahkshi spines and stuff like that. WELL WORTH THE MONEY!

author: Pepper
title: extra pieces
review:
I got this set for my birthday in 2005. Well onto the pros. and cons..

Pros.
5 vahki
Panrakh (the brown Rakshi)
extra pieces
mask of time
disk of time
krataa
canister

Cons.
some useless pieces
only 1 Rakshi
missing 1 vahki

Overall nice set, good Bionicle starter set.
